result.arabic_text: فَٱصۡفَحۡ عَنۡهُمۡ وَقُلۡ سَلَٰمٞۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ
result.translation: (89) So turn aside from them and say, "Peace."[1456] But they are going to know.
result.footnotes: [1456]- Meaning safety or security, i.e., "I will not harm you."  This was before permission was granted for armed struggle.
